# Key jumps (same MM-DD)
 4y jump: 2020-03-20 -> 2024-03-20 (civil delta=1461)
  - gregorian       kin=230 (Δ161)  sign=10 (Δ 1)  tone= 9 (Δ 5)
  - leap_intercalary kin=228 (Δ160)  sign= 8 (Δ 0)  tone= 7 (Δ 4)
  - leap_double     kin=232 (Δ162)  sign=12 (Δ 2)  tone=11 (Δ 6)
 8y jump: 2020-03-20 -> 2028-03-20 (civil delta=2922)
  - gregorian       kin=131 (Δ 62)  sign=11 (Δ 2)  tone= 1 (Δ10)
  - leap_intercalary kin=128 (Δ 60)  sign= 8 (Δ 0)  tone=11 (Δ 8)
  - leap_double     kin=134 (Δ 64)  sign=14 (Δ 4)  tone= 4 (Δ12)
16y jump: 2020-03-20 -> 2036-03-20 (civil delta=5844)
  - gregorian       kin=193 (Δ124)  sign=13 (Δ 4)  tone=11 (Δ 7)
  - leap_intercalary kin=188 (Δ120)  sign= 8 (Δ 0)  tone= 6 (Δ 3)
  - leap_double     kin=198 (Δ128)  sign=18 (Δ 8)  tone= 3 (Δ11)

# Subcycle period hints (years)
gregorian:
  period(kin)   = (none <=64y)
  period(sign)  = (none <=64y)
  period(tone)  = (none <=64y)
  period(group) = (none <=64y)
leap_intercalary:
  period(kin)   = 52
  period(sign)  = 4
  period(tone)  = 13
  period(group) = 4
leap_double:
  period(kin)   = (none <=64y)
  period(sign)  = (none <=64y)
  period(tone)  = (none <=64y)
  period(group) = (none <=64y)
